data.actual_result: The embed always says resolving instant invite.
data.expected_result: The embed says invalid invite (as on desktop).
data.short_description: The instant invite embeds say resolving instant invite even if the invite is invalid or has expired or of a server you're banned from.
data.steps_to_repro: - Update to 698. - Get out of the friends tab as soon as possible to avoid crash. - Type out a fake invite. - Observe the embed.
